title: ibminer
author: ibminer
content: No Happy 31st Birthday threads yet..? well I'm surprised!  ¬†I guess it happens after 30.. (had to throw something together, not much time though.. so I modified a prior thermos signal I created.. yes, there are 31 candles! =P)Happy Birthday thermos!

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Probably everyone is busy with the candle sticks ( on Bitcoin price chart ). Sorry to say this but theymos, you're getting old and am I only person who feels that after 30s we are too old for some fun things?

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: I noticed it too (why did I check his profile?) today, but wasn't sure if the date is real (I'm born April 1st, 1337 according to my profile).If real: congrats!

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: ibminer on June 15, 2022, 02:32:42 PM<....>Good job OP nice catch and I want to greet a happy birthday to our administrator theymos if it is true what is written on his profile cause what's LoyceV said that what we saw in the profile of a user is real cause some of them are not true to hide their identities and secure their privacy.But if its true then all I can say is that theymos is still young, but when the years came our age getting old.Happy Birthday Thermos.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: As seen from the theymos profile, it looks real even though it's all no one knows its authenticity.Always be healthy sir, you will be an important person here, and only one wish you always healthy.  üçªüçª

comments.author: ibminer
comments.body: Quote from: Findingnemo on June 15, 2022, 02:44:21 PMProbably everyone is busy with the candle sticks ( on Bitcoin price chart ). Maybe related??  .. a giant sell-off to get funds for a massive bday party? lolQuote from: LoyceV on June 15, 2022, 02:53:12 PMQuote from: Shamm on June 15, 2022, 03:11:59 PMQuote from: salad daging on June 15, 2022, 03:17:43 PMHe's confirmed it in the past with various birthday threads. 2021: qwk bumped the 2014 thread2020: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5255605.msg54624416#msg546244162019: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5154471.msg51479438#msg514794382018: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4473976.msg40204436#msg40204436.. and 2017 by mole0815:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=653912.msg57237388#msg57237388.. I'm now noticing he is increasingly becoming concerned about his lawn.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: ibminer on June 15, 2022, 03:31:16 PMHe's confirmed it in the past with various birthday threads. 2021: qwk bumped the 2014 thread2020: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5255605.msg54624416#msg546244162019: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5154471.msg51479438#msg514794382018: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4473976.msg40204436#msg40204436.. and 2017 by mole0815:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=653912.msg57237388#msg57237388.. I'm now noticing he is increasingly becoming concerned about his lawn. CheesySo, it's all true. Ok, then I join the congratulations and wish that his lawn is always green and fresh.  Apparently, theymos is not so old, which means that he will be able to work for the benefit of the crypto community for many more years. At least that's what I wish him. Why was this day not announced in advance - it was possible to hold a gift contest for theymos.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Happy Birthday to one and only theymos whose birthday I can only remember because of posts like this. Have a great one!

comments.author: Oluwa-btc
comments.body: +1 üéàBeautiful Birthday Wishes Big T ( Theymos )Enjoy your day. Cheers ü•Ç

comments.author: shahzadafzal
comments.body: Oh yeah it‚Äôs really is her birthday!I confirmed with Google too‚Ä¶ So Happy Birthday theymos!!

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Damn is it this time already again , how the time is flying around , a year is literally nothing and goes so fast over.So also from me the best congratulations and Happy Birthday  theymos .Have a great and enjoy your special day with your family and friends .

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Damn, time flies so fast... 31 already. It looked like theymos was in his early 20s just few years ago.Happy birthday, theymos!

comments.author: BITCOIN4X
comments.body: Happy birthday to theymos !!!I hope he's not too busy to see the market candle blown by the storm. Well, I could be wrong and hope he actually has a little fun celebrating with us here. Time will not go back, but we will move forward. Next year, he will celebrate for 32 years.

comments.author: theymos
comments.body: Thanks! Quote from: BITCOIN4X on June 15, 2022, 07:58:34 PMI hope he's not too busy to see the market candle blown by the storm.Quote from: Findingnemo on June 15, 2022, 02:44:21 PMProbably everyone is busy with the candle sticks ( on Bitcoin price chart ). The market has gifted me with a great buying opportunity. Quote from: LTU_btc on June 15, 2022, 07:34:00 PMDamn, time flies so fast... 31 already. It looked like theymos was in his early 20s just few years ago.People have long expected me to be in my 40s, and I'm getting closer and closer to meeting those expectations!

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Quote from: shahzadafzal on June 15, 2022, 05:30:23 PMOh yeah it‚Äôs really is her birthday!Hate to burst your bubble, but theymos is a male

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: theymos on June 16, 2022, 12:44:53 AMPeople have long expected me to be in my 40s, and I'm getting closer and closer to meeting those expectations!Trust me, there is nothing special here to see. Don't rush. Happy  Birthday !
